description.english: In the Knight Union, increase the character rank to this level (110)
description.schinese: 在侠客联盟中,将角色段位提升至该段位(110)

description.english: Self-written Experience Notes has reached a total of 100 volumes.
description.schinese: <自行书写的阅历笔记的数量累计达到100册>

description.english: Accumulated total of 800 benefits claimed in the Knight Union.
description.schinese: <累计在侠客联盟中领取800份福利>

description.english: Accumulated a total of 300 participations in the martial arts arena.
description.schinese: <累计在比武场中参赛300次>

description.english: At the end of the martial arts competition, ranked 1st on the HEROES.
description.schinese: <比武大赛结束时,在江湖榜上获得一次第1名>

description.english: Totally auctioned 500 sets of Experience Notes in the Auction.
description.schinese: <在竞宝楼阁累计寄拍500册阅历笔记>

description.english: The character's life expectancy reaches 500 years.
description.schinese: <角色寿缘达到500岁>

description.english: The character's age reaches 60 years.
description.schinese: <角色年龄达到60岁>

description.english: Increased carrying weight limit to 500 kg.
description.schinese: <负重上限提升至500公斤>

description.english: Max HP reaches 30,000.
description.schinese: <最大生命值达到30,000>

description.english: Max Stamina reaches 500.
description.schinese: <最大体力值达到500>

description.english: Max Nimbus reaches 10,000.
description.schinese: <最大灵气值达到10,000>

description.english: Accumulate to 9,000 Aura points.
description.schinese: <将气场积攒到9,000点>

description.english: Read and study specialized books on at least 18 types of weapons.
description.schinese: <阅读并学习至少18种武器的专精书籍>

description.english: Accumulated 900 summonings of any type of puppet.
description.schinese: <累计召唤900次任意类型傀儡>

description.english: Accumulated 900 summonings of any type of Sprite.
description.schinese: <累计召唤900次任意类型精灵>

description.english: Spectate and gain experience, accumulate 600 times.
description.schinese: <观战并获得阅历值,累计600次>

description.english: First character death.
description.schinese: <角色第一次死亡>

description.english: Cumulative character deaths: 100.
description.schinese: <角色累计死亡一百次>

description.english: First permanent character death.
description.schinese: <角色第一次永久死亡>

description.english: Accumulated 5,000 spiritual beast kills.
description.schinese: <累计击杀5,000只灵兽>

description.english: A total of 300 treasure chests were discovered & opened in the wild.
description.schinese: <野外探险时,累计发现并打开300个宝箱/陶罐>

description.english: A total of 100 monuments were discovered & paid tribute to in the wild.
description.schinese: <在野外累计发现并致敬100座纪念碑>

description.english: A total of 50 giant trees were discovered and worshiped in the wild.
description.schinese: <在野外累计发现并礼拜50颗参天巨树>

description.english: 100 cactus stone idols were discovered and worshiped in the wild.
description.schinese: <在野外累计发现并祭祀仙人掌石像100次>

description.english: 300 criminal heads were submitted.
description.schinese: <累计上缴300颗通缉犯头颅>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Scalies monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只游鳞族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Avifauna monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只飞翼族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Terrestria monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只猛兽族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Insecta monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只虫豸族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Mossesque monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只苔藓族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Arboria monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只树灵族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Bamgrasia monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只竹草族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Lianthine monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只藤蔓族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Fungusoid monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只菌菇族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Parasitica monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只寄生族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Microformia monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只菌群族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Energon monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只能量族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Artificial monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只造物族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Primordial monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只源生族妖兽>

description.english: Slain a total of 1,000 Cthulosaur monsters.
description.schinese: <累计击杀1,000只远古族妖兽>

description.english: First time crossing the Edge of the World
description.schinese: <首次穿越世界边缘>

description.english: In the Knight Union - Contract House, welcome the return of 50 Knight.
description.schinese: <在侠客联盟-缔约堂中迎接50位冒险归来的侠客>

description.english: Accumulated consumption of 5,000,000 Jettons in the Pastime.
description.schinese: <在博戏游坊中累计消费500万枚/彩筹>

description.english: Accumulated win of 3,880,000 Jettons in the Pastime.
description.schinese: <在博戏游坊中累计赢取388万枚/彩筹>

description.english: No less than 300,000 Jettons on single bet, In the Pastime-PokerHouse!
description.schinese: <在博戏游坊-牌局中单次下注不小于30万枚/彩筹>

description.english: Win no less than 100,000 Jettons at a time! In the Pastime-PokerHouse!
description.schinese: <在博戏游坊-牌局中单次获利不小于10万枚/彩筹>

description.english: Cumulative buying 1000 pastime lottery.
description.schinese: <累计购买1000张游坊彩票>

description.english: Win first prize in the lottery once.
description.schinese: <赢得一次游坊彩票一等奖>

description.english: Win the ultimate prize once, In the Pastime-Flying apsaras-Game machine.
description.schinese: <在博戏游坊-飞天阁的游戏机上获得一次终极大奖>

description.english: Accumulated pick up 150,000 SpiritStone.
description.schinese: <累计拾取150,000枚/灵石>

description.english: In SpiritStone bank's assets are not less than 5,000,000.
description.schinese: <灵石银行储蓄资产不小于5,000,000枚/灵石>

description.english: The first bag opened is the final treasure, in Treasure hunt - Market.
description.schinese: <商会-宝袋开开乐中拆开的第一个宝袋就是最终宝藏>

description.english: The Last bag opened is the final treasure, in Treasure hunt - Market.
description.schinese: <商会-宝袋开开乐中拆开的最后一个宝袋是最终宝藏>

description.english: Entrust the Market to sell the overstocked products for 90 times.
description.schinese: <委托货贸商会代售90次积压货物>

description.english: Each donation of food ≥ 30 portions, Donate 5 times. In Large Granary.
description.schinese: <在大粮仓中单次捐赠食材数量不少于30份,捐赠5次>

description.english: In Divine Hot-Pot, each cooking ≥6 types of cuisines for 10 sessions.
description.schinese: <在厨神鼎中单次烹制美食种类不少于6种,烹饪10次>

description.english: In Alchemy Hall. Make 100 of Medicine Liquid with the best combo.
description.schinese: <在丹仙亭中以最佳搭配萃取100份药液>

description.english: In Alchemy Hall. Make 100 of Medicinal Ointment with the best combo.
description.schinese: <在丹仙亭中以最佳搭配熬制100份药膏>

description.english: In Alchemy Hall. Make 100 of Elixirs with the best combo.
description.schinese: <在丹仙亭中以最佳搭配炼制100份丹药>

description.english: Accumulated 50 meals in Restaurant.
description.schinese: <累计在大酒楼食用50份美食>

description.english: Treat 100 diners to drinks in Restaurant.
description.schinese: <在大酒楼中请100位食客喝酒>

description.english: Send an item at an auction and sell it at a price ≥150,000 SpiritStones.
description.schinese: <在拍卖会上寄拍一件物品,并以≥15万灵石的价格成交>

description.english: The cumulative purchased Safe Vault space is not less than 180 slots.
description.schinese: <累计购买的灵石银行-保险库空间不小于180格>

description.english: Convert 1,500 groups of Goods that expire into products in Selling Floor.
description.schinese: <在银行-贸易厅中将1,500组到期商品转换为货物[箱]>

description.english: Have no less than 24 products at the same time.
description.schinese: <同一时间拥有不少于24种贸易货物>

description.english: Have no less than 1,000 container of products at the same time.
description.schinese: <同一时间拥有不少于1,000箱/贸易货物>

description.english: Sell no less than 1,200 containers of products through market-Trade fair.
description.schinese: <累计通过商会-贸易集会卖出不少于1,200箱货物>

description.english: Unlock 500 chests in the Treasure Hunt.
description.schinese: <在寻宝区累计解锁500个宝箱>

description.english: Cumulative successful purchase of 150 stamps.
description.schinese: <累计成功购买150枚邮票>

description.english: Successfully bid on a [S+] quality Express Parcel in postal-unclaimed.
description.schinese: <在邮局-处理区中成功竞拍一件[鸿蒙]品质的快递>

description.english: Cumulatively cutting down 10,000 trees or shrubs.
description.schinese: <累计砍伐10,000颗树木或灌木>

description.english: Cumulatively mining 5,000 mineral ores.
description.schinese: <累计挖掘5,000座矿产原石>

description.english: Cumulatively collecting 5,000 Spiritual Herbs.
description.schinese: <累计采集5,000株灵植>

description.english: Casting a fishing net and catching Seafood a total of 1,000 times.
description.schinese: <抛投渔网并捕捉到海鲜,累计1,000次>

description.english: SpiritStone purse limit is not less than 90,000.
description.schinese: <灵石钱包额度不小于90,000枚/灵石>

description.english: Purchase once S package in SpiritStone bank - Selling Floor.
description.schinese: <购买一次灵石银行-贸易厅的[内幕]资讯套餐>

description.english: Accumulated equity share of SpiritStone bank shall be no less than 60%.
description.schinese: <累计购买灵石银行的股权份额不小于60%>

description.english: Flying distance is more than 150,000 Feet,In Pastimet-flying Apsaras.
description.schinese: <在博戏游坊-飞天阁中单局飞行距离超过150,000尺>

description.english: The trade quota of the market is not less than 800,000 points.
description.schinese: <货贸商会的贸易额度不小于80万点>

description.english: Accumulated 150 parcels to be delivered in the Mail Hall receiving area.
description.schinese: <在邮件厅-配送区中累计领取150个待送包裹>

description.english: Make 3,000 wooden planks in the Sawmill Workshop.
description.schinese: <在锯木工坊-累计制作3,000张木板>

description.english: Smelt alloy of [S] quality or higher 30 times in the Blacksmith Forge.
description.schinese: <在铁匠熔炉中冶炼30次不小于[传说]品质的合金>

description.english: Accumulate repairing 48 pieces of equipment in the Blacksmith Forge.
description.schinese: <累计在铁匠熔炉中修复48件装备>

description.english: Strengthen one piece of equipment to 36 stars in the Blacksmith's Forge.
description.schinese: <在铁匠熔炉中将一件装备强化至36颗星>

description.english: Reset the attributes of 60 equipment cumulatively in Blacksmith's Forge.
description.schinese: <累计在铁匠熔炉中重铸60次装备>

description.english: Purchased a total of 70 books of various genres at the library.
description.schinese: <累计在大学宫购买70册各类典籍>

description.english: Purchased a total of 140 light source items at Firelight-Hall.
description.schinese: <累计在灯火阁购买140件光源类物品>

description.english: Accumulate 5,000 intimacy points.
description.schinese: <累计获取5,000点亲密度>

description.english: Total of 300,000 SpiritStones cast into the Well of Legacy.
description.schinese: <累计向传承古井中投入300,000枚灵石>

description.english: Total of 90 items cast into the Well of Legacy.
description.schinese: <累计向传承古井中投入90件物品>
